text: There Will Be No Leave Today () is a 1959 Soviet movie directed by Andrei Tarkovsky and Aleksandr Gordon.Прощание с Леонидом Куравлевым проходит в МосквеСегодня увольнения не будет It stars Oleg Borisov, Aleksei Alekseyev, and Pyotr Lyubeshkin. ==Actors== * Oleg Borisov as captain Galich * Aleksei Alekseyev as colonel Gvelesiani * Pyotr Lyubeshkin as party secretary Vershinin * Oleg Mokshantsev as military engineer Vishnyakov * Vladimir Marenkov as military engineer Vasin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1959 movies Category:Movies directed by Andrei Tarkovsky
title: There Will Be No Leave Today
